title: Prerequisites
breadcrumbs: Create the employee sample application step by step
text:
Prerequisites

Typescript

In order to follow this guide, you must have a basic knowledge about typescript and its syntax. You can learn Typescript using these resources:




Digging (in) Javascript and Typescript


Typescript handbook


Typescript Deep Dive





Node.js

Node.js is the runtime used in devon4node. It is required a basic knowledge about Node.js before starting to use devon4node.




Learn Node.js





NestJS

devon4node is not a framework, is a set of good practices, modules and code generators to use with NestJS. In order to use devon4node, it requires NestJS basic knowledge. You can learn about NestJS in its official documentation.
